description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter application called 'Menu Image Generator'. It sets up the app theme, routes, loads environment variables, and defines root widgets and placeholders for views.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, builds theme and routes.

classes.name: _ResultsPlaceholderScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for results view, displays a simple text summary.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes Flutter, loads environment variables and runs the app.

methods.name: _buildTheme
methods.description: Creates and returns a customized dark theme for the application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of MyApp widget that returns MaterialApp with theme and routing.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method of _ResultsPlaceholderScreen widget that renders a placeholder UI.
